meanings.definition: A substance that produces or stimulates the growth of tissue.
meanings.sent1: The histogen in the plant fertilizer helps the flowers grow.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying a new histogen that could aid in tissue regeneration.
meanings.sent3: The histogen in the soil seemed to have a magical effect on the plant growth.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as a histogen, nurturing hope in the hearts of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The histogen worked like a superhero, rescuing the damaged tissues.

meanings.definition: A cell or group of cells that give rise to tissues.
meanings.sent1: The histogen in the embryo develops into different types of tissues.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching how histogens play a crucial role in tissue formation.

meanings.sent4: Her determination acted as a histogen, inspiring others to grow and thrive.
